profile:
COVID 19 UPDATE:  We are open for business during this time and here to assist you with all of your project needs. We are following all of the health and safety guidelines as directed by the Province of Ontario and if coming onsite will be practicing social distancing to ensure the safety of our technicians and our customers. All of our technicians are checked each day Contact us today to schedule an appointment or consultation. 



RPM is a contract sales organization founded with the mission to combine best practices in Client contact, Training, Management and Quality Assurance into a complete service platform that consistently delivers exceptional results for our clients. RPM’s mission is to form long lasting relationships with each of our customers so we can grow our brand and provide continuous value. RPM is committed to treating your home like our own. We will take care of the things you don’t want to, or can’t, do. Our leadership team has a combined 60+ years of experience

****

Our Services:

****

Attic Insulation, Mold Remediation, Mold Prevention, Heating/Cooling, Exterior Window Cleaning, Gutter Cleaning and Gutter Guard Installation.

*****
Is your Furnace and/or AC on the Fritz? Is your equipment struggling to get the job done? RPM’s HVAC division provides and installs the best equipment with the best warranty in the business.

****

RPM’s Fibre Cellulose Insulation is a non-toxic natural product produced from 100% recycled papers helping reduce landfill waste and preserves natural resources.
Eco-Friendly Cellulose Insulation also requires a fraction of the energy to produce (as well as producing less carbon dioxide) than fiberglass. It also helps protect your home’s peace and quiet through its effective noise reduction capabilities and keep your home comfortable year round by limiting heat flow.

****

When was the last time you ventured into your attic? If you are like most home owners, its been a while! Attics typically are often forgotten about until a roof leak occurs.
Since attics are often out of sight & out of mind, they easily become a breeding ground for mold. Believe it or not, attics are one of the most common places for mold growth in a home.

****

RPM’s team uses highly purified water to ensure your satisfaction with our window cleaning services in North America. No cleaning chemicals are required.
The latest innovations in pure water window cleaning come from pure water cleaning. Most water has tiny dissolved particles in it. Once the water dries on a surface, those particles become the spots you see left behind. Purified water is the key to leaving no spots or residue on windows.
The water-fed pole removes the environmental impact of chemicals by using pure water alone, while allowing operators to clean windows safely – and more quickly – from the ground. 
RPM uses the next generation of pure water-fed poles, systems, and accessories, taking our window cleaning business to new heights. RPM uses Northern Lite water-fed poles and brushes.
For the hard to get dirt we use the Tucker Hybrid brush with boar hair bristles.

profile:
Watson Electrical is a full-service Electrical installation and repair Contractor, that has been in business since 1983, serving residential and commercial customers in the Ottawa and surrounding area.
 
Our goal is to provide timely, professional and excellent service on every job we perform.
 
Our licenced electricians are provincial trained, knowledgeable and experienced. They are trustworthy and respectful with all customers.
 
We can help you upgrade electrical panels, repair old wiring, install new outlets, switches, and lighting. We trouble shoot and repair the electrical problem(s) in your home or business.
 
Our Skilled electricians make your home and business electrically safe.
 
We are fully licenced and insured.
 
ESA ECRA# 7000302
services: Commercial and residential electrical renovation, EV chargers, LED retrofit.
